light_name = 'light_2', light_mode = 'Daylight', act_type = 'udp'

    @then(parsers.parse('Check udp syncPilot if {light_name} mode is changed to {light_mode} by {act_type}'))
    def check_udp_syncPilot_light_mode(target, light_name, light_mode, act_type):
        """
        - Narrative:
            Check if {light_name} light mode is {light_mode} by udp syncPilot
            {act_type}: udp syncPilot src; value: udp, wizappd(tcp), schd, intl, hb...
        """
        logger.info("check " + light_name + " udp syncPilot light mode")
        scene_id = translator_scene_id(light_mode)
        udp_sync_res = target.udp.get_udp_sync_pilot(light_name, act_type)
        logger.info("udp syncPilot:" + str(udp_sync_res))
    
        if int(udp_sync_res["params"]["sceneId"]) != int(scene_id):
            logger.info("Error : check " + light_name + " light mode UDP syncPilot fail! should be " + str(scene_id) +
                        ", but was " + str(udp_sync_res["params"]["sceneId"]))
            assert False, "check " + light_name + " light mode UDP syncPilot fail! should be " + str(scene_id) + \
>                         ", but was " + str(udp_sync_res["params"]["sceneId"])
